pr_title: DROOLS-5876: Display actual test results instead of a generic message

timeline.bodyText: Will it be a problem for i18n that these are only in English?
timeline.author: Rikkola

timeline.bodyText: Same thing in this class. i18n might be an issue.
timeline.author: Rikkola

replies.bodyText: @Rikkola Thank you for spotting, you're right. Usually, I can easily manage i18n on the front end side, but how I should manage it backend side?
replies.author: yesamer

replies.bodyText: @yesamer @Rikkola My suggestion would to return keys/maps from the backend, and consume I18n API in the front end :-)
replies.author: karreiro

replies.bodyText: @Rikkola @karreiro Can you please point me an example? :)
replies.author: yesamer
Rikkola

replies.bodyText: @Rikkola Thank you, I moved all messages on the client-side and managed them with i18n.
replies.author: yesamer
